claim: Metadata included the number of times an article was cited (Fig. 1).
title: Fig. 1.
caption: The retrieval of Web of Science citations from HPE journals and their enhancement with Altmetric Explorer data, usage counts, and notation of their public accessibility (*The public accessibility of all citations was determined by the author team by hand. †Data were not available for the Journal of Continuing Education in Health Professions (JCEHP) and therefore its 109 citations were removed prior to analysis)
